name: snowpeak
title: Snowpeak
desc: A bold template for newsrooms, bloggers, and audio-first creators.
article:
Snowpeak is a punchy dark-mode theme built for opinionated blogs, podcast hubs, and membership-driven media sites. Designed for creators who want clarity, structure, and a little swagger.


  • Learn more about Snowpeak
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • 3x Landing Pages
  • About
  • Advertise
  • Membership
  • Jobs (CC)
  • Team (CC)
  • Blog x2 (CC)
  • Podcast (CC)
  • Authors (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Contact
  • Password Reset
  • Error 404


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Custom audio player
  • Podcast & blog tags
  • Podcast & blog Paywall
  • Podcast & blog Subscribers Only
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
